Are you retarded? I've tried the crack

The crack that made another explorer.exe and stole your e-mails and shit was from another group as far as I know. That was with the retail + crack that was released. There was a fake crack and a real crack in the same release lol. The fake one was so obvious lol. SKIDROW wouldn't do that though. Maybe you should, like, scan things before you run them.

I've used TPB for quite some time, though i rarely post.....

This is the first crack I have EVER DLed that required my AV to reboot my pc. 

When it restarted, something strange did indeed happen, though I have no idea what is was as it happened too fast.....

I don't know what is this torrent as i deleted asap and didn't bother to keep it long enough to really find out.

I'm quite displeased as this is coming under the tag of 'skidrow' even though it is obvious this isn't him.

I would bother with this torrent, it may be good or not, but its certainly not the 'simple' crack you are looking for lol
